column2: I give this place two thumbs up.  Service is usually great
column3: and I've never been disappointed by the food.  The staff
column6: and knowledgeable about the things they offer.  I absolutely recommend this place
column7: and definitely recommend sitting at the bar and enjoying the company of the bartenders.  They all seem to get along so well
column8: and they are all really great at what they do.
